MysteryDragons.name: Death Song
MysteryDragons.description: The Death Song has colourful wings, fins on its head, long spines along its back, long horns, and barbels.
MysteryDragons.color: It is covered in striking and bright colours of blue, yellow, and orange.

MysteryDragons.name: Hideous Zippleback
MysteryDragons.description: The Hideous Zippleback has two heads, horns, a split tail, and lobs along its necks, back, and tail.
MysteryDragons.color: It comes in different colours, mainly green, blue, or gold with spots and a cream underbelly.
MysteryDragons.size: Large: 70 feet 10 inches (21.59 meters) long, 8 feet 1 inch (2.46 meters) tall.

MysteryDragons.name: Smothering Smokebreath
MysteryDragons.description: The Smothering Smokebreath has yellow eyes, a skull-like head, a smoke-like tail, spines along its back, and a nasal horn flanked by two smaller ones.
MysteryDragons.color: It is dark and light grey.
MysteryDragons.size: Small: 6 feet (1.83 meters) long, 2 feet 5 inches (0.74 meters) tall.
